评论概述: Very nice pants in my humble opinion
评论详情: So I just got these pants. I got dark gray very nice color. They look like work pants which I like. I’m not a dress up kind of guy, but I think you could wear them out and not look like you just got off work. I washed them and they did shrink some, but they’re 98% cotton and anyone expecting them not to shrink is an idiot., I wear a size 36x 32 these fit great I have a bit of a beer belly and they fit just a little snug but they’re stretchy and I don’t like wearing a belt anyway, I’m retired now so I’m not working much so I can’t comment on how well they hold up at work. Some reviews said the pockets are too deep maybe they just have really short arms, some reviews say the leg openings are way too big. Maybe they just have very small feet. I thought the leg openings were a little narrow., Some said the pockets were too snug and hard to getting  hands in, Maybe they just have massive hands., I paid $75 for the pair I bought not the best deal ever but a very good pair of pants as far as I can see try a pair , Send it back if you don’t like  them
Durable, comfortable, breathable, great pants. Just wish the price wasn’t so high, but what you gonna do in this economy?

评论概述: Excellent work pant, but the legs are WIDE.
评论详情: Material seems very durable, the build (stitching, seams, pockets) looks like quality work but the legs are almost bell-bottom wide, as if they stitched a much smaller waist size to a much larger pair of pant legs. YMMV.

评论概述: Best out of six live/work pants
评论详情: I purchased several brands of pants that would present well for business as a real estate investor and be durable on the project site as well. I came back and purchased 3 more of these so I can wear them everyday. They don’t make em like they used to, except for these pants.

评论概述: Rugged but not as comfortable as cotton
评论详情: These are probably good pants if you’re working construction of a similar job. But I find them a little stiff for casual use. Wore them on a long flight recently and wished I’d stuck with my old cotton cargo pants. Lots of pockets, gussets and reinforced areas. So it’s a trade-off. I’ll save them for my next cold weather project where cotton pants would get damaged.
I really like these pants. The fit & feel and the functionality of the pockets.  These were a go to work pant for me…until they shrunk in the dryer (low heat setting).

My husband got these and was so happy with them, we purchased another pair. He picked out a 38x34 and they were a bit big on him, and after a day of work and play?! He’s thinking of another pair. I can say they did shrink up after washing them. And you will be folding these and putting them somewhere?! They will not hang and look normal in the closet, it’s the way they’re cut?! They shape to the wearer and flex well, my husband exclaimed. They will fold and sit on a shelf, or the back of a chair if you’re my husband.
True fit decent construction, went back and bought another pair.

finally found some tough but comfortable pants that aren't tight around the waist or need 1000 hours to break in. Pockets are nice and spacious. And the snap is tactile and positive. These are just good.

评论概述: Front pockets so small can’t get my hands inside
评论详情: I own and love 3 pairs of these pants in different colors (warm gray x 2, cool gray x 1) and they’re great. However, I just purchased the same size in both black and tombstone — and those two versions are differently patterned and made in Vietnam instead of Egypt. The holes to the front pockets in the pants made in Vietnam are so small I can’t even fit my hands inside them. Moreover the legs are a lot longer than the other pairs. And the whole pant hangs poorly. Disappointed. The pairs made in Egypt fit great. The pairs made in Vietnam feel cheap and like they were sewn by children.

评论概述: Bummer, legs shrunk 1.75 inches!  Now, so short that they look ridiculous.
评论详情: I really liked these pants but the legs shrank so much that they are just about unwearable, yard work only, not suitable for public wear.  Original 30" inseam now measures 28.25 inches.  I do not recommend these pants due to the high shrinkage, if you must, order extra long or only hang to dry.

I like the styling and material of these pants.  The fit is as expected.  I usually wear a 33 waist but since it was not offered I went down to 32 as recommended and the fit is great.  The cell phone pocket could be a little wider.  My Samsung 21+ with Otter Box protector case is a very tight fit in the side pocket.  I don't have this issue with Carhartt or my other pants.

评论概述: Pockets are incorrectly sized and positioned.
评论详情: The front pockets are extremely deep. Have you ever seen a man with a giant rubber glove impregnate a cow? That's what getting a coin from your pocket will look like if you have these pants. Dang near  elbow deep. Each front pocket is like half a backpack. The extra leg pocket on the right side Is perfectly sized but far lower on the leg than you want. Things in that pocket swing when you walk. The fabric and stitching looks excellent. If they fixed  this issue I would buy again. The fit was very good/ true to advertised numbers.

I've been wearing these for work for a couple of years now, and they hold up very well. The inseam is high so the cuffs don't drag and they stack really well with boots. The phone pocket is just the right size and can support heavier objects like rifle magazines. I carry a folding knife with a pocket clip every day, and there isn't a hint of the fabric breaking down where the clip rubs. There are a lot of rivets, to the point of setting off metal detectors.  The rear pockets get kind of saggy if you overload them, and since they are a nylon blend, they aren't exactly chemical or flame resistant so I wouldn't do any woodland firefighting or welding in them.  Overall, these are really good pants. The fit is comparable to Kuhl's and the build quality is far better than Carhartt or Dickies.
Nice, rugged work pants.  My only complaint is the length.  I'd suggest getting one size longer in length than your usual size. Other than that, they're good pants.

These pants are fantastic. They are all at once cozy, soft, and durable. They also effectively keep the cold out in this winter life at the foothills of the Twin Sisters Range in northern Washington state.
They fit ok but it fills like the legs are twisted all the time there not but it fills like.

They’re comfortable I’ll give them that but don’t plan on using them for work, I got the smallest amount of bleach on my hands ,so I washed my hands and dried them off on my pants , an hour later the things were dissolving where I dried my hands off , 10/10 for looks and comfort 2/10 for durability
In fact, very good quality! Attention to details on stitching is a plus.
Fit as expected

评论概述: Great Alternative to More Expensive Brand
评论详情: These pants are a very close alternative to the brand of pants you are probably already aware of that's how you found these.  They are not quite as heavy but the look is very close.  I have three pairs that I wear for work.  The leg opening is wide enough to fit over boots but it is a tapered leg perfect for working in environments where there are things to snag your pants on.  They are very comfortable especially with the added materiel in the waist band.  The cell phone pocket is perfectly located.  They aren't as durable as some more heavy duty brands but I work in a warehouse and they are the best work pants I have had yet.  I have also found them to be the perfect camping pants.  I will buy these for years to come if they stick around.  The attention to stitching in the crotch and knees really adds to the comfort.
These pants are perfect in way...fit,  durability,  comfort. The material is thicker without being stiff.  Will definitely buy more. Worth the price.
Seemed really good at first but now the legs have shrunk to the point of being floods.

评论概述: I hate long pants… These pants may change my mind.
评论详情: Great fitting. Comfortable. Ordered 2 more .
Comfortable. Perfect fit for my size and weight

This was my 2nd order for the same product because the first shipment was the wrong size shipped. These pants are a near copy of the Kuhl Rydr product. These are constructed using 10.5 oz 98 % cotton, 2% spandex. The stitching is identical as are the rivets and waist fastener except for the Kuhl imprint. The zipper material is a heavy-duty plastic where the Kuhl Rydr is made of metal. These pants are a good value. They are very comfortable and have a softer feel than the Kuhl product. Let's hope they hold up during this coming Maple Syrup season.

The pants looked good when I received them, that was the the hi light… The cut is fairly baggy. The first and only time I wore them several of the little rivets on the pockets just kept falling off. I washed them in cold water and lightly tumbled on low and finished drying them by hanging them up. They are now to short to wear. They must have shrunk up 2-3 inches in length. I normally buy Kuhl pants and these have a similar look but not worth the savings. Very disappointed. I don’t know if I can return them because I have worn and washed them once but won’t wear them again. Purchased 32”x34”, waist was fine.

评论概述: Fit and looks better than I expected.
评论详情: Little pricey but overall, TK Flex is worth it.
These TK Flex pants are super comfortable, while being incredibly durable.  Love the side pant pocket for my iphone, perfect fit!  Also, quick delivery. Very happy with my purchase.

Perfect mix of function and style, my new go to pair of pants. The cut has some room, but isn't too baggy, they are NOT skinny jeans. The cell phone pocket comes in super handy and I'm hoping they have additional colors available soon. Comfortable and durable. Would buy this brand again!
